p: About tannin content, their concentrations vary greatly among different species of brown seaweeds, as well as among different geographical areas [ 12]. The tannin content of our extract (54.3 mg per g) appeared similar to that showed by Dang et al., who founded a tannin content of 56.17 Â± 0.22 mg per g of the Australian Padina sp. extract [ 16].
